name: zklabubuio-game-sp1
description: zkLabubuio Game with SP1 zero-knowledge proof integration

scripts.sp1-cli:
node -e "console.log('
ðŸŽ® zkLabubuio Game SP1 CLI
'); console.log('Available commands:'); console.log('  npm run dev              - Start development server'); console.log('  npm run build            - Build for production'); console.log('  npm run test:sp1         - Test SP1 proof system'); console.log('  npm run prove:sp1        - Generate SP1 proof'); console.log('  npm run install:sp1      - Install SP1 toolchain'); console.log('
ðŸš€ Quick start: npm run dev
');"
scripts.dev:frontend: cd zklabubu_game && npm run build:dev && cd www && npm start
scripts.dev:frontend-only: cd zklabubu_game && npm run build:dev && cd www && npm start
scripts.build: npm run build:wasm && npm run build:frontend
scripts.build:vercel: npm run setup:vercel && npm run build:wasm && npm run build:frontend
scripts.setup:vercel: cd zklabubu_game && npm install && cd www && npm install
scripts.setup:github: echo 'ðŸ”§ Setting up zkLabubuio Game for GitHub users...' && npm install && cd zklabubu_game && npm install && cd www && npm install && echo 'âœ… Setup complete! Run: npm run dev'
scripts.install:sp1: curl -L https://sp1up.succinct.xyz | bash && export PATH="$HOME/.sp1/bin:$PATH" && sp1up

author: zkLabubuio Team
